subject: Re: How to get the Connection Pool in my test cases
msgSnippet: Hi, we are settings the data source in hibernate.cfg.xml in this way  java:comp/env/jdbc/DisclosureDataSource
messageBody:
Hi,


we are settings the data source in hibernate.cfg.xml in this way

<property name="hibernate.connection.datasource">
java:comp/env/jdbc/DisclosureDataSource
</property>
<property name="dialect">org.hibernate.dialect.OracleDialect</property>

please check this. if have any suggestions tell me.

Thanks & Regards,
Thanuja.
